AT.name: Geki Yaba Runner Deluxe
AT.description: Transform your moustached hero into a raging force of destruction or a super speedy gnome to overcome Gekiyaba’s toughest obstacles to face the ultimate challenge. Can you overcome every hurdle to save the princess in peril? Begin your challenging and amazing adventure! Test your skills in over 130 ultrahard levels. Transform your hero into a raging beast or a lightning-fast sprinting athlete. Stay focused and don't get distracted by the illusions of the boss castles. Key Features: - one of the hardest 'runners' out there - put your skills to the test in over 130 levels - overcome challenging obstacles hidden deep in the castles - prove yourself a hero by saving the princess Only with Geki Yaba Runner can you really test how good your skills are. Only with Geki Yaba Runner will you find the true meaning of challenge. Only with Geki Yaba Runner will you experience a truly wonderful adventure. Are you ready to dash into the gnomish world of Geki Yaba?

BE.name: Geki Yaba Runner Deluxe
BE.description: Tranformez votre héro moustachu pour tout détruire sur votre passage ou pour foncer à toute allure dans un seul but : venir à bout des obstacles et déjouez les pièges tendus par les châteaux «casse-tête ». Serez-vous à la hauteur pour récupérer la princesse et un maximum de chaussettes ? Mettez vos réflexes à l’épreuve à travers 130 niveaux qui font de Geki Yaba Runner un des runners les plus difficiles. Quelques points forts du jeu : · Un des runners les plus périlleux ! · Mettez vos compétences à l'épreuve dans 130 niveaux · Transformez votre nain de jardin en machine de guerre ou en athlète ultra rapide · Ne vous laissez pas avoir par les illusions des niveaux châteaux Avec Geki Yaba Runner Deluxe, teste tes réflexes et embarque pour une aventure fantastique au royaume de nains de jardin vraiment déjantés.

ZA.name: Geki Yaba Runner Deluxe
ZA.description: Transform your moustached hero into a raging force of destruction or a super speedy gnome to overcome Gekiyaba’s toughest obstacles to face the ultimate challenge. Can you overcome every hurdle to save the princess in peril? Begin your challenging and amazing adventure! Test your skills in over 130 ultrahard levels. Transform your hero into a raging beast or a lightning-fast sprinting athlete. Stay focused and don't get distracted by the illusions of the boss castles. Key Features: - one of the hardest 'runners' out there - put your skills to the test in over 130 levels - overcome challenging obstacles hidden deep in the castles - prove yourself a hero by saving the princess Only with Geki Yaba Runner can you really test how good your skills are. Only with Geki Yaba Runner will you find the true meaning of challenge. Only with Geki Yaba Runner will you experience a truly wonderful adventure. Are you ready to dash into the gnomish world of Geki Yaba?
